thread.title: 19 Tweets That Will Make Scientists Laugh Then Cry
thread.title_full: 19 Tweets That Will Make Scientists Laugh Then Cry

author: Kelly Oakes
title: 19 Tweets That Will Make Scientists Laugh Then Cry
text:
View this image › 
Twitter: @kahoakes ID: 10330860 16. Plot idea: 97% of the world's scientists contrive an environmental crisis, but are exposed by a plucky band of billionaires & oil companies.
— Scott Westerfeld (@ScottWesterfeld) ID: 10330869 17. I fucking LOVE science. *is handed peer reviewed journal* Haha nonono I meant CGI pictures of space with misattributed quotes as captions
— shut up, mike (@shutupmikeginn) ID: 10319649 18. For the next 20 days, the planet Mercury, much like Western civilization, will appear to be moving backwards.
— SarcasticRover (@SarcasticRover) ID: 10330927 19. The concept of global warming was created by and for the Chinese in order to make U.S. manufacturing non-competitive.
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) ID: 10330828 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Kelly Oakes is science editor for BuzzFeed and is based in London.
